parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: MixStreamId
parameters.description: The ID of the stream mixing task. If the task was created by calling the [CreateMixStream](~~194148~~) operation, check the value of the response parameter MixStreamId to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Valid values: an integer that is greater than **0** and does not exceed the maximum value of the INTEGER data type. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **1000**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the output stream.
